instructionsTab.getWallet: Get a wallet to use on Sovryn
instructionsTab.title: What is a wallet?
instructionsTab.p1: A wallet is a home for your digital assets, such as cryptocurrencies or NFTs. You can use it to send, receive, and store digital assets.
instructionsTab.p2: It’s also a new way to log in. Instead of creating a new account and password on every website or dapp, you can just connect your wallet.
instructionsTab.p3: Find out how to get a wallet to use on Sovryn in the wiki.
